AddExternalSAMLIdPCertificate.title: AddExternalSAMLIdPCertificate
AddExternalSAMLIdPCertificate.summary: Adds a Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) signing certificate.

AddPermissionPolicyToAccessConfiguration.title: AddPermissionPolicyToAccessConfiguration
AddPermissionPolicyToAccessConfiguration.summary: Adds a policy to an access configuration.

AddUserToGroup.title: AddUserToGroup
AddUserToGroup.summary: Adds a user to a group.

ClearExternalSAMLIdentityProvider.title: ClearExternalSAMLIdentityProvider
ClearExternalSAMLIdentityProvider.summary: Clears the configurations of a Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) identity provider (IdP).

CreateAccessAssignment.title: CreateAccessAssignment
CreateAccessAssignment.summary: Assigns access permissions on an account in your resource directory to a user or a group by using an access configuration.

CreateSCIMServerCredential.title: CreateSCIMServerCredential
CreateSCIMServerCredential.summary: Creates a System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) credential.

CreateUserProvisioning.title: CreateUserProvisioning
CreateUserProvisioning.summary: Creates a Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning.

DeleteAccessAssignment.title: DeleteAccessAssignment
DeleteAccessAssignment.summary: Removes the access permissions on an account in a resource directory.

DeleteMFADeviceForUser.title: DeleteMFADeviceForUser
DeleteMFADeviceForUser.summary: Unbinds a multi-factor authentication (MFA) device from a user.

DeleteSCIMServerCredential.title: DeleteSCIMServerCredential
DeleteSCIMServerCredential.summary: Deletes a System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) credential.

DeleteUserProvisioning.title: DeleteUserProvisioning
DeleteUserProvisioning.summary: Deletes a Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning.

DeleteUserProvisioningEvent.title: DeleteUserProvisioningEvent
DeleteUserProvisioningEvent.summary: Deletes a Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning event.

DeprovisionAccessConfiguration.title: DeprovisionAccessConfiguration
DeprovisionAccessConfiguration.summary: De-provisions an access configuration from an account in your resource directory.

DisableDelegateAccount.title: DisableDelegateAccount
DisableDelegateAccount.summary: Disables the delegated administrator account of CloudSSO.

EnableDelegateAccount.title: EnableDelegateAccount
EnableDelegateAccount.summary: Enables the delegated administrator account of CloudSSO.

GetAccessConfiguration.title: GetAccessConfiguration
GetAccessConfiguration.summary: Queries information about an access configuration.

GetDirectorySAMLServiceProviderInfo.title: GetDirectorySAMLServiceProviderInfo
GetDirectorySAMLServiceProviderInfo.summary: Queries information about a Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) service provider (SP).

GetDirectoryStatistics.title: GetDirectoryStatistics
GetDirectoryStatistics.summary: Queries the statistics of a directory.

GetExternalSAMLIdentityProvider.title: GetExternalSAMLIdentityProvider
GetExternalSAMLIdentityProvider.summary: Queries the configurations of a Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) identity provider (IdP).

GetLoginPreference.title: GetLoginPreference
GetLoginPreference.summary: Queries the logon preference of CloudSSO users.

GetMFAAuthenticationSettingInfo.title: GetMFAAuthenticationSettingInfo
GetMFAAuthenticationSettingInfo.summary: Queries the multi-factor authentication (MFA) setting of all users.

GetMFAAuthenticationSettings.title: GetMFAAuthenticationSettings
GetMFAAuthenticationSettings.summary: Queries the multi-factor authentication (MFA) setting of all users.

GetMFAAuthenticationStatus.title: GetMFAAuthenticationStatus
GetMFAAuthenticationStatus.summary: Checks whether multi-factor authentication (MFA) is enabled for users.

GetPasswordPolicy.title: GetPasswordPolicy
GetPasswordPolicy.summary: Queries the password policy of CloudSSO users.

GetSCIMSynchronizationStatus.title: GetSCIMSynchronizationStatus
GetSCIMSynchronizationStatus.summary: Queries the status of System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) synchronization.

GetTask.title: GetTask
GetTask.summary: Queries information about an asynchronous task.

GetTaskStatus.title: GetTaskStatus
GetTaskStatus.summary: Queries the status of an asynchronous task.

GetUserId.title: GetUserId
GetUserId.summary: Queries the ID of a user in a resource directory by using the ExternalId parameter.

GetUserMFAAuthenticationSettings.title: GetUserMFAAuthenticationSettings
GetUserMFAAuthenticationSettings.summary: Queries the multi-factor authentication (MFA) setting of a single user.

GetUserProvisioning.title: GetUserProvisioning
GetUserProvisioning.summary: Queries a Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning.

GetUserProvisioningConfiguration.title: GetUserProvisioningConfiguration
GetUserProvisioningConfiguration.summary: Queries the global configurations of a Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning.

GetUserProvisioningEvent.title: GetUserProvisioningEvent
GetUserProvisioningEvent.summary: Queries the information about a Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning.

GetUserProvisioningRdAccountStatistics.title: GetUserProvisioningRdAccountStatistics
GetUserProvisioningRdAccountStatistics.summary: Queries statistics of Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning events that are created for the member in a resource directory.

GetUserProvisioningStatistics.title: GetUserProvisioningStatistics
GetUserProvisioningStatistics.summary: Queries the statistics of a Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning.

ListAccessAssignments.title: ListAccessAssignments
ListAccessAssignments.summary: Queries the access permissions that are assigned.

ListAccessConfigurationProvisionings.title: ListAccessConfigurationProvisionings
ListAccessConfigurationProvisionings.summary: Queries the access configurations that are provisioned.

ListExternalSAMLIdPCertificates.title: ListExternalSAMLIdPCertificates
ListExternalSAMLIdPCertificates.summary: Queries Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) signing certificates.

ListGroupMembers.title: ListGroupMembers
ListGroupMembers.summary: Queries the users in a group.

ListJoinedGroupsForUser.title: ListJoinedGroupsForUser
ListJoinedGroupsForUser.summary: Queries the groups to which a user is added.

ListMFADevicesForUser.title: ListMFADevicesForUser
ListMFADevicesForUser.summary: Queries the multi-factor authentication (MFA) devices that are bound to a user. Up to two MFA devices can be bound to a user.

ListPermissionPoliciesInAccessConfigurat.title: ListPermissionPoliciesInAccessConfiguration
ListPermissionPoliciesInAccessConfigurat.summary: Queries the policies that are created for an access configuration.

ListUserProvisioningEvents.title: ListUserProvisioningEvents
ListUserProvisioningEvents.summary: Queries Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning events.

ListUserProvisionings.title: ListUserProvisionings
ListUserProvisionings.summary: Queries Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisionings.

ProvisionAccessConfiguration.title: ProvisionAccessConfiguration
ProvisionAccessConfiguration.summary: Provisions an access configuration for an account in your resource directory.

RemoveExternalSAMLIdPCertificate.title: RemoveExternalSAMLIdPCertificate
RemoveExternalSAMLIdPCertificate.summary: Removes a Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) signing certificate.

RemovePermissionPolicyFromAccessConfigur.title: RemovePermissionPolicyFromAccessConfiguration
RemovePermissionPolicyFromAccessConfigur.summary: Removes a policy from an access configuration.

RemoveUserFromGroup.title: RemoveUserFromGroup
RemoveUserFromGroup.summary: Removes a user from a group.

ResetUserPassword.title: ResetUserPassword
ResetUserPassword.summary: Resets the password of a user.

RetryUserProvisioningEvent.title: RetryUserProvisioningEvent
RetryUserProvisioningEvent.summary: Retries a Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning event.

SetExternalSAMLIdentityProvider.title: SetExternalSAMLIdentityProvider
SetExternalSAMLIdentityProvider.summary: Configures a Security Assertion Markup Language (SAML) identity provider (IdP).

SetLoginPreference.title: SetLoginPreference
SetLoginPreference.summary: Configures the logon preference of CloudSSO users.

SetMFAAuthenticationStatus.title: SetMFAAuthenticationStatus
SetMFAAuthenticationStatus.summary: Enables or disables multi-factor authentication (MFA) for users in a directory.

SetPasswordPolicy.title: SetPasswordPolicy
SetPasswordPolicy.summary: Configures a password policy for CloudSSO users.

SetSCIMSynchronizationStatus.title: SetSCIMSynchronizationStatus
SetSCIMSynchronizationStatus.summary: Enables or disables System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) synchronization.

UpdateAccessConfiguration.title: UpdateAccessConfiguration
UpdateAccessConfiguration.summary: Modifies information about an access configuration.

UpdateDirectory.title: UpdateDirectory
UpdateDirectory.summary: Changes the name of a directory.

UpdateGroup.title: UpdateGroup
UpdateGroup.summary: Modifies the information about a group.

UpdateInlinePolicyForAccessConfiguration.title: UpdateInlinePolicyForAccessConfiguration
UpdateInlinePolicyForAccessConfiguration.summary: Modifies an inline policy that is created for an access configuration.

UpdateMFAAuthenticationSettings.title: UpdateMFAAuthenticationSettings
UpdateMFAAuthenticationSettings.summary: Modifies the multi-factor authentication (MFA) setting of all users.

UpdateSCIMServerCredentialStatus.title: UpdateSCIMServerCredentialStatus
UpdateSCIMServerCredentialStatus.summary: Enables or disables a System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) credential.

UpdateUserMFAAuthenticationSettings.title: UpdateUserMFAAuthenticationSettings
UpdateUserMFAAuthenticationSettings.summary: Modifies the multi-factor authentication (MFA) setting of a single user.

UpdateUserProvisioning.title: UpdateUserProvisioning
UpdateUserProvisioning.summary: Modifies a Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning.

UpdateUserProvisioningConfiguration.title: UpdateUserProvisioningConfiguration
UpdateUserProvisioningConfiguration.summary: Modifies the global configurations of a Resource Access Management (RAM) user provisioning.

UpdateUserStatus.title: UpdateUserStatus
UpdateUserStatus.summary: Changes the status of a user.
